snippet: By filing for an extension, a taxpayer can go beyond the April 15 deadline in filing a return, but there are downsides.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column suggests that those who find themselves struggling to make deadline of April 15 for filing taxes apply for extension; offers answers to some of most commonly asked questions about filing taxes.
lead_paragraph: By filing for an extension, a taxpayer can go beyond the April 15 deadline in filing a return, but there are downsides.

headline.print_headline: An Extension Sends Tax Season Into Overtime
headline.main: An Extension Sends Tax Season Into Overtime
